title: Game client bugging out for a few New Zealanders.

embed.description: r/leagueoflegends: This is a subreddit devoted to League of Legends.

body:
The reddit post has everything you need to know, but long story short this bug is nothing normal. 
I've come across basically every bug in the game and none of them compare to how obnoxious this one is.
You literally can't play because it says you have to repair your game files in the client, you go do that and repair them then it just tells you to do it again....
It's a very serious problem as i've never come across it before..
On top of that i'm currently reinstalling the game due to this bug and after two full repai attempts i was FORCED to reinstall. 

Whatever riot coded into 9.3 ain't working.
